ValidationRule.description: Cannont change any fileds in an opportuntiy after 3 days.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Mrg_Approved__c, "Closed (Ink)"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Mrg_Approved__c), "Closed (Ink)")), OR((($Profile.Name = "RegionalSalesMgr")), ($Profile.Name = "AccountExec"), ( $Profile.Name = "VicePres")), ( TODAY() - Approved_Date__c > 3))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot make any changes to an opportunity after 3 days of Manager Approval Date
